title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: This bug report addresses an issue related to the maximized state of a view when switching perspectives.
OB: The observed behavior is not provided, and the expected behavior is not specified either.
EB: The expected behavior should be clarified to describe what the software should do when switching between perspectives. The observed behavior should also be included to highlight the problem clearly.
SR:
To address this issue, the steps to reproduce the problem have been provided:
1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective.
2. Double-click the title bar to maximize it.
3. Switch to the resource perspective.
4. Return to the Java perspective.
